episodes.title: Danger
episodes.plot: Host Stephen Fry and guests Sean Lock, Jimmy Carr, Jo Brand and Alan Davies live on the edge as they tackle the subject of danger.

episodes.title: Discoveries
episodes.plot: Host Stephen Fry and guests Arthur Smith, Clive Anderson, Vic Reeves and Alan Davies explore uncharted territory in this edition dedicated to discoveries.

episodes.title: Dogs
episodes.plot: This edition features guests Alan Davies, Liza Tarbuck, Jeremy Clarkson and Neil Mullarkey sniffing around the subject of dogs.

episodes.title: Dictionaries
episodes.plot: This edition features Alan Davies, Phill Jupitus, Ronni Ancona and Rory Bremner tackling the subject of dictionaries.

episodes.title: Death
episodes.plot: This edition features Alan Davies, Sean Lock, Andy Parsons and Clive Anderson gravely tackling the subject of death.

episodes.title: Drinks
episodes.plot: This edition features Alan Davies, John Sessions, Phill Jupitus and Jimmy Carr taking a swig and answer questions on the subject of drinking.

episodes.title: Differences
episodes.plot: Host Stephen Fry and guests Alan Davies, Julian Clary, Jo Brand and Dara O'Briain try and find common ground in this edition dedicated to the topic of differences.

episodes.title: Descendants
episodes.plot: In a Children in Need special, Jonathan Ross, Rich Hall, Phill Jupitus and Alan Davies tackle the subject of descendants.

episodes.title: Doves
episodes.plot: Host Stephen Fry and guests David Mitchell, Andy Hamilton, John Sessions and Alan Davies get to grips with doves.

episodes.title: Divination
episodes.plot: Guests Graeme Garden, Johnny Vaughan, Phill Jupitus and Alan Davies look to the heavens and get to grips with divination.

episodes.title: Denial and Deprivation
episodes.plot: Stephen Fry hosts the quiz show and is joined by panellists Vic Reeves, Roger McGough, Alan Davies and Mark Steel to confront matters of denial and deprivation.

episodes.title: Domesticity
episodes.plot: Host Stephen Fry and guests Jo Brand, Jessica Stevenson, Alan Davies and Phill Jupitus make themselves at home discussing the topic of domesticity.

episodes.title: December
episodes.plot: Stephen Fry hosts the quiz show in which contestants are rewarded more if their answers are 'quite interesting'. Christmas special with Jo Brand, Rich Hall, Alan Davies and Dara O Briain.
